job.title: Network Engineer
job.description: ltpgtA permanentdirecthire ltstronggtNetwork Engineerltstronggt position is available with an IT organization located in Roseville CA Only local candidates are currently being considered ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtEssential Duties and ResponsibilitiesltpgtltulgtltligtDesigning and implementing new network solutions andor improving the efficiency of current networksltligtltligtInstalling configuring and supporting network equipment including routers proxy servers switches WAN accelerators DNS and DHCPltligtltligtConfiguring firewalls routing and switching to maximize network efficiency and securityltligtltligtMaximizing network performance through ongoing monitoring and troubleshootingltligtltligtArranging scheduled upgradesltligtltligtInvestigating faults in the networkltligtltligtUpdating network equipment to the latest firmware releasesltligtltligtReporting network status to key stakeholdersltligtltligtSupport services for Microsoft related technologies Windows Server Exchange SQL O365 etc Virtualization technologies VMware and HyperV Remote access solutions Fortinet VPN Duo DHCP and DNS Security Suite FortiNet Carbon Black MimeCastltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtKnowledge Skills andor Abilities Required ltpgtltulgtltligt3 years experience with Networking and SecurityltligtltligtInterpersonal skills such as telephony skills communication skills active listening and customercareltligtltligtAbility to multitask and adapt to changes quicklyltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtApply nowltpgt
